mapper.insert: INSERT ignore INTO success_killed (seckill_id, user_phone, stat, create_time) VALUES (#{secKillID}, #{userPhone}, 0, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.stat, sk.create_time, s.seckill_id "secKill.seckill_id", s.name "secKill.name", s.start_time "secKill.start_time", s.end_time "secKill.end_time", s.create_time "secKill.create_time" FROM success_killed sk INNER JOIN seckill s ON sk.seckill_id = s.seckill_id WHERE sk.seckill_id = #{seckillID} AND sk.user_phone = #{userPhone}
